Package com.github.deltaspikedbunit.dbunit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DbUnitRunner
    Exposes methods to execute before and after test runs using DatabaseSetup, DatabaseTearDown and ExpectedDatabase annotations.
    DbUnitTestContext
    Provides context for a test.
    DbUnitTestRule
    JUnit rule to: set up a database before test execution through DatabaseSetup verify database content after test execution through ExpectedDatabase leave a database in a known state after test execution through DatabaseTearDown This is meant to replace DatabaseTest and DatabaseNoRollbackTest when a test cannot run in the same transaction, or only just wrapped by the same interceptor.
    JdbcConnectionDatabaseTester
    DatabaseTester that uses the JDBC connection obtained during initialization.
    NoOpOperationListener
    Listener for IDatabaseConnection events which does not close the jdbc connection after setup or teardown.
